# trackingState

**Instance Property**

The general quality of position tracking available when the camera captured a frame.

## Declaration

```swift
var trackingState: ARCamera.TrackingState { get }
```

## Discussion

When this value is [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCamera/TrackingState-swift.enum/limited(_:)], see the associated [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCamera/TrackingState-swift.enum/Reason] value for a possible cause of low tracking quality.

## Handling Tracking Status

- **ARCamera.TrackingState**: Values for position tracking quality, with possible causes when tracking quality is limited.
